name: MIBR NFT Collection Drop — Grab a Piece of E-sports History
body:
Made   in   Brazil  ( MIBR ), an e-sports OG and a true legend, is commemorating its twenty years of history with the release of a series of limited edition NFTs with Bybit. The first series comprises 12 different jersey designs — each embodying a compelling chapter of the team's journey. Step into the mesmerizing world of NFTs, where you relive MIBR's epic victories, tears, and unparalleled contribution to the world of competitive e-gaming. 

Twelve (12) limited edition NFTs will be released through six (6) separate drops on the Bybit NFT Marketplace over the course of six (6) weeks. Each week, one (1) free and one (1) paid MIBR NFTs will be made available to mint and purchase on a first-come, first-served basis. 

🗓️ Mark Your Calendars







Collect different designs to redeem amazing rewards. 

Rewards are classified into three tiers according to the number of NFTs collected.

Level 1 — All 12 NFTs:  An autographed 20th Anniversary MIBR Jersey.
Level 2 — 11 NFTs:  Personalized message from an MIBR ambassador or player.
Level 3 — 7 to 10 NFTs:  100 BRZ bonus on Bybit + 15% MIBR Store coupon (valid for all MIBR products, except collaborations with other brands such as New Era, Champion, and more).  








About MIBR
Made in Brazil, commonly known by its acronym MIBR (stylized as MiBR or mibr), is a professional e-sports organization with players competing in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Siege, and VALORANT. It was a member of the G7 Teams. MIBR was founded on March 1, 2003, in the city of Rio de Janeiro, where the Brazilian businessman Paulo Velloso decided to invest in his son's dream.




Terms and Conditions:

name: Velocity Series: Embark on Snowfro's Artistic Odyssey
body:
The moment we've all been waiting for is here! We're thrilled to unveil the  NFT  drop by  Erick   Calderon , also known as  Snowfro , a Houston-based artist whose boundary-pushing artistic experimentation leaves his mark on the world of generative art.

This is the third installment in the Velocity Series, an unprecedented collaboration spearheaded by Oracle Red Bull Racing and Bybit. We invite you to embark on a captivating artistic odyssey where velocity intersects with technology and creativity in an unparalleled way.


About the NFTs

///:  Snowfro's algorithmic, embroider-able collection of 2000 NFTs embodies the essence of speed through simple formal elements. He explores the delightful interplay of color and variability while working within the constraints of a physical 15-thread embroidery machine. Part of the limited collection will be available in a public rebate Dutch auction, with a special twist.


This limited collection will be available for minting in two phases: 




Velocity Pass holders are entitled to a one-hour free-mint phase for the /// NFT collection at 2PM UTC, on Oct 25, 2023. During this period, up to 1,000 NFTs will be available for free minting. A snapshot will be taken before the start of Phase 1 to determine participants' eligibility.


Following Phase 1, a one-hour public Dutch auction with rebates will commence at 3PM UTC, on Oct 25, 2023. This auction will include 700 + any remaining NFTs from the free-mint phase. The rebate Dutch auction is open to the public.




How to Get a Velocity Pass?

body:
We're thrilled to introduce two formidable trading tools to our derivatives trading product lineup: Chase Limit Order and Scaled Order, designed to elevate your trading experience.





 


 Chase Limit Order: 

A dynamic limit order that adapts to real-time market conditions, ensuring you make the most of your trades.

 Ideal for: 

·Placing larger orders individually. 

·Making quick fills as a maker. 

·Executing orders near Ask1/Bid1. 


 Scaled Order: 

Break down substantial orders into smaller sub-orders, strategically placed at incremental price levels. 

Perfect for: 

·Executing large orders step by step. 

·Utilizing multiple orders for precise entry points.

name: Introducing Double-Win: Surf Volatility to Score
body:
What's the key to riding out periods of massive market fluctuations or sudden spikes in volatility? The three S'es: Stoicism, Swift response, and creative hedging Strategies. We're thrilled to introduce a Bybit Earn product that offers them all. 


 Unveiling Double-Win  

Double-Win is an advanced short-term structured product that helps users preempt strong market movements in  both directions. 

 Learn more about Double-Win   

How does it work? 

 Double-Win is based on the concept of binary options. At expiration, users either receive a payoff if the settlement price sits outside the preset range, or nothing at all if the price falls within the range. 

 To subscribe to a Double-Win plan, start by setting a Double-Win range based on your prediction of the price of the underlying asset. 

 Here are the payoff scenarios of a Double-Win plan: 





 When to use Double-Win?   


Below are some examples of when a Double-Win plan might be suitable: 


Stay Ahead of the Curve:  Subscribe to Double-Win before the release of major indices such as CPI or LPR that may impact the market.
Finger on the Market Pulse:  Capitalize on headline events such as Ethereum upgrades or legal decisions.
Speculate on Swings:  Leverage strong market volatility within your Double-Win subscription period.
Hedge Against Volatility:  Help to manage market volatility risks with preset price ranges. 



 Key Advantages  

 -  Quick Settlement:  Provide a quick turnaround for your investment as Double-Win plans settle in as short as eight (8) hours.

 -  Diverse Preset Range:  Choose from a variety of preset ranges that give you the flexibility to tailor your strategies to market conditions. 

-  Unlimited Potential Returns:  Potential returns increase as the settlement price moves further away from the Double-Win range. 



 Availability 

 Double-Win is available on the Bybit website and app. 


 Catch the wave of market volatility. Discover Double-Win on Bybit.

name: Introducing Chase Limit Order: A New Derivatives Trading Tool
body:
We are excited to announce the addition of a new trading feature on Bybit: Chase Limit Order.

What is a Chase Limit Order? 

Chase Limit Order is a limit order placed at the best bid or ask that dynamically adjusts its entry price to match changing market conditions until the order is filled, canceled, or reaches a maximum chase distance. 

For more information on Chase limit Order, please refer to our   .

Key Benefits of Using Chase Limit Order

Swift Execution: Chase Limit Order allows traders to swiftly enter the market in maker order, minimizing the time spent waiting for favorable price levels. 
Reduced Slippage: Chase Limit Order helps mitigate the risk of slippage and approaches desired entry price as much as possible by dynamically tracking the best ask/bid. 
Arbitrage Opportunities: Chase Limit Orders create potential arbitrage chances by closely tracking market movements, enabling traders to profit from price disparities between markets or trading pairs. 

Currently, Chase Limit Order is available for Inverse Contracts, USDT Perpetuals, USDC Perpetuals, and USDC Futures on Bybit. 



Note:  To ensure an optimal user experience on the Bybit App, please upgrade to app v4.27.0 as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please reach out to our Customer Support team by submitting a case via   .

name: Spot Trading Now Supports One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) Orders
body:
Spot Trading Now Supports One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) Orders 

We've added One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) order functionality to Bybit's Spot Trading on both our website and app. 

What Is an OCO Order? 
OCO orders allow you to set up two conditional triggers—one for an upper limit and one for a lower limit. When one is activated, the other is automatically canceled, executing a market or limit order. 

Why Use OCO Orders? 
1. Capital Efficiency: Allocate the cost of a one-sided order to establish conditional orders in both directions. 
2. Market Navigation: Utilize dual-directional triggers to manage exposure, enabling Take Profit and Stop Loss settings for your Spot assets. 
For more information, please check our  .

name: Introducing Chase Limit Order: A New Derivatives Trading Tool
body:
We are excited to announce the addition of a new trading feature on Bybit: Chase Limit Order.

What is a Chase Limit Order? 

Chase Limit Order is a limit order placed at the best bid or ask that dynamically adjusts its entry price to match changing market conditions until the order is filled, canceled, or reaches a maximum chase distance. 

For more information on Chase limit Order, please refer to our   .

Key Benefits of Using Chase Limit Order

Swift Execution: Chase Limit Order allows traders to swiftly enter the market in maker order, minimizing the time spent waiting for favorable price levels. 
Reduced Slippage: Chase Limit Order helps mitigate the risk of slippage and approaches desired entry price as much as possible by dynamically tracking the best ask/bid. 
Arbitrage Opportunities: Chase Limit Orders create potential arbitrage chances by closely tracking market movements, enabling traders to profit from price disparities between markets or trading pairs. 

Currently, Chase Limit Order is available for Inverse Contracts, USDT Perpetuals, USDC Perpetuals, and USDC Futures on Bybit. 



Note:  To ensure an optimal user experience on the Bybit App, please upgrade to app v4.27.0 as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please reach out to our Customer Support team by submitting a case via   .

name: Introducing Double-Win: Surf Volatility to Score
body:
What's the key to riding out periods of massive market fluctuations or sudden spikes in volatility? The three S'es: Stoicism, Swift response, and creative hedging Strategies. We're thrilled to introduce a Bybit Earn product that offers them all. 


 Unveiling Double-Win  

Double-Win is an advanced short-term structured product that helps users preempt strong market movements in  both directions. 

 Learn more about Double-Win   

How does it work? 

 Double-Win is based on the concept of binary options. At expiration, users either receive a payoff if the settlement price sits outside the preset range, or nothing at all if the price falls within the range. 

 To subscribe to a Double-Win plan, start by setting a Double-Win range based on your prediction of the price of the underlying asset. 

 Here are the payoff scenarios of a Double-Win plan: 





 When to use Double-Win?   


Below are some examples of when a Double-Win plan might be suitable: 


Stay Ahead of the Curve:  Subscribe to Double-Win before the release of major indices such as CPI or LPR that may impact the market.
Finger on the Market Pulse:  Capitalize on headline events such as Ethereum upgrades or legal decisions.
Speculate on Swings:  Leverage strong market volatility within your Double-Win subscription period.
Hedge Against Volatility:  Help to manage market volatility risks with preset price ranges. 



 Key Advantages  

 -  Quick Settlement:  Provide a quick turnaround for your investment as Double-Win plans settle in as short as eight (8) hours.

 -  Diverse Preset Range:  Choose from a variety of preset ranges that give you the flexibility to tailor your strategies to market conditions. 

-  Unlimited Potential Returns:  Potential returns increase as the settlement price moves further away from the Double-Win range. 



 Availability 

 Double-Win is available on the Bybit website and app. 


 Catch the wave of market volatility. Discover Double-Win on Bybit.

name: Spot Trading Now Supports One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) Orders
body:
Spot Trading Now Supports One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) Orders 

We've added One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) order functionality to Bybit's Spot Trading on both our website and app. 

What Is an OCO Order? 
OCO orders allow you to set up two conditional triggers—one for an upper limit and one for a lower limit. When one is activated, the other is automatically canceled, executing a market or limit order. 

Why Use OCO Orders? 
1. Capital Efficiency: Allocate the cost of a one-sided order to establish conditional orders in both directions. 
2. Market Navigation: Utilize dual-directional triggers to manage exposure, enabling Take Profit and Stop Loss settings for your Spot assets. 
For more information, please check our  .

name: Introducing the Bybit x Decentra Bootcamp: Embrace a New Era in Blockchain Education
body:
Attention all blockchain enthusiasts! We are thrilled to announce our groundbreaking collaboration with Decentra to bring you an immersive and intensive Blockchain Engineering Bootcamp, taking place from Oct 2023 to Dec 2023.This marks our first groundbreaking educational sponsorship in the CIS region, providing aspiring individuals with an unmatched opportunity to delve into blockchain and develop essential career skills.


The bootcamp is exclusively for Bybit users! Not yet a Bybit user?







 
📚 The Ultimate Learning Experience 

This 8-week program is thoughtfully designed to equip developers with crucial web3 and blockchain expertise. Each week, participants will engage in an intense 4-day bootcamp, with each online course spanning 90 minutes. Throughout this transformative journey, participants will gain invaluable knowledge in the creation of smart contracts, dApps, DeFi protocols, and various other blockchain-related products.


🌟 Unparalleled Expertise 

Bybit's renowned experience in blockchain and cryptocurrency markets ensures that you will receive real-world insights and trading expertise. As a participant, you'll have exclusive access to connect with industry experts, mentors, and like-minded enthusiasts. This invaluable networking opportunity will pave the way for future career prospects and collaborations in the blockchain realm.


 🔮 Empowering the Future

This partnership fosters innovation and drives adoption in the industry, offering specialized education for aspiring engineers. Following the 8-week bootcamp, you can put your skills to the test in the upcoming Decentrathon hackathon scheduled for Mar, 2024.


🤝 Continued Support for Education

We remain dedicated to offering accessible, high-quality content for cryptocurrency enthusiasts, traders, and blockchain aficionados. For more free crypto resources, visit   


Join us on this incredible educational journey from Oct 2023 to Dec 2023. Secure your spot today!

name: Velocity Series: Embark on Snowfro's Artistic Odyssey
body:
The moment we've all been waiting for is here! We're thrilled to unveil the  NFT  drop by  Erick   Calderon , also known as  Snowfro , a Houston-based artist whose boundary-pushing artistic experimentation leaves his mark on the world of generative art.

This is the third installment in the Velocity Series, an unprecedented collaboration spearheaded by Oracle Red Bull Racing and Bybit. We invite you to embark on a captivating artistic odyssey where velocity intersects with technology and creativity in an unparalleled way.


About the NFTs

///:  Snowfro's algorithmic, embroider-able collection of 2000 NFTs embodies the essence of speed through simple formal elements. He explores the delightful interplay of color and variability while working within the constraints of a physical 15-thread embroidery machine. Part of the limited collection will be available in a public rebate Dutch auction, with a special twist.


This limited collection will be available for minting in two phases: 




Velocity Pass holders are entitled to a one-hour free-mint phase for the /// NFT collection at 2PM UTC, on Oct 25, 2023. During this period, up to 1,000 NFTs will be available for free minting. A snapshot will be taken before the start of Phase 1 to determine participants' eligibility.


Following Phase 1, a one-hour public Dutch auction with rebates will commence at 3PM UTC, on Oct 25, 2023. This auction will include 700 + any remaining NFTs from the free-mint phase. The rebate Dutch auction is open to the public.

name: MIBR NFT Collection Drop — Grab a Piece of E-sports History
body:
Made   in   Brazil  ( MIBR ), an e-sports OG and a true legend, is commemorating its twenty years of history with the release of a series of limited edition NFTs with Bybit. The first series comprises 12 different jersey designs — each embodying a compelling chapter of the team's journey. Step into the mesmerizing world of NFTs, where you relive MIBR's epic victories, tears, and unparalleled contribution to the world of competitive e-gaming. 

Twelve (12) limited edition NFTs will be released through six (6) separate drops on the Bybit NFT Marketplace over the course of six (6) weeks. Each week, one (1) free and one (1) paid MIBR NFTs will be made available to mint and purchase on a first-come, first-served basis. 

🗓️ Mark Your Calendars







Collect different designs to redeem amazing rewards. 

Rewards are classified into three tiers according to the number of NFTs collected.

Level 1 — All 12 NFTs:  An autographed 20th Anniversary MIBR Jersey.
Level 2 — 11 NFTs:  Personalized message from an MIBR ambassador or player.
Level 3 — 7 to 10 NFTs:  100 BRZ bonus on Bybit + 15% MIBR Store coupon (valid for all MIBR products, except collaborations with other brands such as New Era, Champion, and more).  








About MIBR
Made in Brazil, commonly known by its acronym MIBR (stylized as MiBR or mibr), is a professional e-sports organization with players competing in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Siege, and VALORANT. It was a member of the G7 Teams. MIBR was founded on March 1, 2003, in the city of Rio de Janeiro, where the Brazilian businessman Paulo Velloso decided to invest in his son's dream.

name: Updates to Auto-Repayment Threshold of Unified Trading Accounts
body:
Bybit will be making an important change to Unified Trading Accounts (UTA) on 9th Oct, 2023.

Starting from the mentioned date, the Auto-Repayment threshold for UTA will be increased from a Maintenance Margin Rate (MMR) of 80% to a MMR of 85%. Post this adjustment, Auto-Repayment will only be triggered when the UTA's MMR reaches 85% to repay outstanding liabilities.

Note: This adjustment will not require any action on your part, as it will reduce the risk of liquidation without affecting existing orders or positions.

If you have any questions or concerns about this adjustment, please don't hesitate to reach out to our Customer Support team through   .

About MIBR
Made in Brazil, commonly known by its acronym MIBR (stylized as MiBR or mibr), is a professional e-sports organization with players competing in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Siege, and VALORANT. It was a member of the G7 Teams. MIBR was founded on March 1, 2003, in the city of Rio de Janeiro, where the Brazilian businessman Paulo Velloso decided to invest in his son's dream.

name: Spot Trading Now Supports One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) Orders
body:
Spot Trading Now Supports One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) Orders 

We've added One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) order functionality to Bybit's Spot Trading on both our website and app. 

What Is an OCO Order? 
OCO orders allow you to set up two conditional triggers—one for an upper limit and one for a lower limit. When one is activated, the other is automatically canceled, executing a market or limit order. 

Why Use OCO Orders? 
1. Capital Efficiency: Allocate the cost of a one-sided order to establish conditional orders in both directions. 
2. Market Navigation: Utilize dual-directional triggers to manage exposure, enabling Take Profit and Stop Loss settings for your Spot assets. 
For more information, please check our  .

This is the third installment in the Velocity Series, an unprecedented collaboration spearheaded by Oracle Red Bull Racing and Bybit. We invite you to embark on a captivating artistic odyssey where velocity intersects with technology and creativity in an unparalleled way.

Following Phase 1, a one-hour public Dutch auction with rebates will commence at 3PM UTC, on Oct 25, 2023. This auction will include 700 + any remaining NFTs from the free-mint phase. The rebate Dutch auction is open to the public.

name: Introducing Chase Limit Order: A New Derivatives Trading Tool
body:
We are excited to announce the addition of a new trading feature on Bybit: Chase Limit Order.

What is a Chase Limit Order? 

Chase Limit Order is a limit order placed at the best bid or ask that dynamically adjusts its entry price to match changing market conditions until the order is filled, canceled, or reaches a maximum chase distance. 

For more information on Chase limit Order, please refer to our   .

Key Benefits of Using Chase Limit Order

Swift Execution: Chase Limit Order allows traders to swiftly enter the market in maker order, minimizing the time spent waiting for favorable price levels. 
Reduced Slippage: Chase Limit Order helps mitigate the risk of slippage and approaches desired entry price as much as possible by dynamically tracking the best ask/bid. 
Arbitrage Opportunities: Chase Limit Orders create potential arbitrage chances by closely tracking market movements, enabling traders to profit from price disparities between markets or trading pairs. 

Currently, Chase Limit Order is available for Inverse Contracts, USDT Perpetuals, USDC Perpetuals, and USDC Futures on Bybit. 



Note:  To ensure an optimal user experience on the Bybit App, please upgrade to app v4.27.0 as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please reach out to our Customer Support team by submitting a case via   .

name: Introducing Double-Win: Surf Volatility to Score
body:
What's the key to riding out periods of massive market fluctuations or sudden spikes in volatility? The three S'es: Stoicism, Swift response, and creative hedging Strategies. We're thrilled to introduce a Bybit Earn product that offers them all. 


 Unveiling Double-Win  

Double-Win is an advanced short-term structured product that helps users preempt strong market movements in  both directions. 

 Learn more about Double-Win   

How does it work? 

 Double-Win is based on the concept of binary options. At expiration, users either receive a payoff if the settlement price sits outside the preset range, or nothing at all if the price falls within the range. 

 To subscribe to a Double-Win plan, start by setting a Double-Win range based on your prediction of the price of the underlying asset. 

 Here are the payoff scenarios of a Double-Win plan: 





 When to use Double-Win?   


Below are some examples of when a Double-Win plan might be suitable: 


Stay Ahead of the Curve:  Subscribe to Double-Win before the release of major indices such as CPI or LPR that may impact the market.
Finger on the Market Pulse:  Capitalize on headline events such as Ethereum upgrades or legal decisions.
Speculate on Swings:  Leverage strong market volatility within your Double-Win subscription period.
Hedge Against Volatility:  Help to manage market volatility risks with preset price ranges. 



 Key Advantages  

 -  Quick Settlement:  Provide a quick turnaround for your investment as Double-Win plans settle in as short as eight (8) hours.

 -  Diverse Preset Range:  Choose from a variety of preset ranges that give you the flexibility to tailor your strategies to market conditions. 

-  Unlimited Potential Returns:  Potential returns increase as the settlement price moves further away from the Double-Win range. 



 Availability 

 Double-Win is available on the Bybit website and app. 


 Catch the wave of market volatility. Discover Double-Win on Bybit.

name: Updates to Auto-Repayment Threshold of Unified Trading Accounts
body:
Bybit will be making an important change to Unified Trading Accounts (UTA) on 9th Oct, 2023.

Starting from the mentioned date, the Auto-Repayment threshold for UTA will be increased from a Maintenance Margin Rate (MMR) of 80% to a MMR of 85%. Post this adjustment, Auto-Repayment will only be triggered when the UTA's MMR reaches 85% to repay outstanding liabilities.

Note: This adjustment will not require any action on your part, as it will reduce the risk of liquidation without affecting existing orders or positions.

If you have any questions or concerns about this adjustment, please don't hesitate to reach out to our Customer Support team through   .

name: Spot Trading Now Supports One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) Orders
body:
Spot Trading Now Supports One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) Orders 

We've added One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) order functionality to Bybit's Spot Trading on both our website and app. 

What Is an OCO Order? 
OCO orders allow you to set up two conditional triggers—one for an upper limit and one for a lower limit. When one is activated, the other is automatically canceled, executing a market or limit order. 

Why Use OCO Orders? 
1. Capital Efficiency: Allocate the cost of a one-sided order to establish conditional orders in both directions. 
2. Market Navigation: Utilize dual-directional triggers to manage exposure, enabling Take Profit and Stop Loss settings for your Spot assets. 
For more information, please check our  .

name: Trading Bot Update: Real-time Withdrawal Now Supported for Spot and Futures Grid Bots
body:
Dear Trader, 

To enhance your trading experience, we're thrilled to announce that real-time withdrawal is now supported for both Spot Grid Bot and Futures Grid Bot. With this update, you'll experience more control, flexibility, and efficiency over your trading assets. 

1. Spot Grid Bot:  Withdraw grid profits directly to the Funding Account without any disruption to the bot's operations. 

2. Futures Grid Bot:  Withdraw both profits generated and margin added while the bot is running. Funds will be automatically credited to the Funding Account. Please note, while bot operations remain unaffected, the margin will correspondingly reduce, and the estimated Liquidation Price may change. 

All return history can be seen on the History page under your Funding Account, giving you complete visibility over your transactions. 

Happy trading!

name: MIBR NFT Collection Drop — Grab a Piece of E-sports History
body:
Made   in   Brazil  ( MIBR ), an e-sports OG and a true legend, is commemorating its twenty years of history with the release of a series of limited edition NFTs with Bybit. The first series comprises 12 different jersey designs — each embodying a compelling chapter of the team's journey. Step into the mesmerizing world of NFTs, where you relive MIBR's epic victories, tears, and unparalleled contribution to the world of competitive e-gaming. 

Twelve (12) limited edition NFTs will be released through six (6) separate drops on the Bybit NFT Marketplace over the course of six (6) weeks. Each week, one (1) free and one (1) paid MIBR NFTs will be made available to mint and purchase on a first-come, first-served basis. 

🗓️ Mark Your Calendars







Collect different designs to redeem amazing rewards. 

Rewards are classified into three tiers according to the number of NFTs collected.

Level 1 — All 12 NFTs:  An autographed 20th Anniversary MIBR Jersey.
Level 2 — 11 NFTs:  Personalized message from an MIBR ambassador or player.
Level 3 — 7 to 10 NFTs:  100 BRZ bonus on Bybit + 15% MIBR Store coupon (valid for all MIBR products, except collaborations with other brands such as New Era, Champion, and more).  








About MIBR
Made in Brazil, commonly known by its acronym MIBR (stylized as MiBR or mibr), is a professional e-sports organization with players competing in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Siege, and VALORANT. It was a member of the G7 Teams. MIBR was founded on March 1, 2003, in the city of Rio de Janeiro, where the Brazilian businessman Paulo Velloso decided to invest in his son's dream.




Terms and Conditions:

name: Congratulations to Bybit Web3 IDO Cyber Arena (CAT) Winners!
Updates to Auto-Repayment Threshold of Unified Trading Accounts
body:
Bybit will be making an important change to Unified Trading Accounts (UTA) on 9th Oct, 2023.

Starting from the mentioned date, the Auto-Repayment threshold for UTA will be increased from a Maintenance Margin Rate (MMR) of 80% to a MMR of 85%. Post this adjustment, Auto-Repayment will only be triggered when the UTA's MMR reaches 85% to repay outstanding liabilities.

Note: This adjustment will not require any action on your part, as it will reduce the risk of liquidation without affecting existing orders or positions.

If you have any questions or concerns about this adjustment, please don't hesitate to reach out to our Customer Support team through   .

name: MIBR NFT Collection Drop — Grab a Piece of E-sports History
body:
Made   in   Brazil  ( MIBR ), an e-sports OG and a true legend, is commemorating its twenty years of history with the release of a series of limited edition NFTs with Bybit. The first series comprises 12 different jersey designs — each embodying a compelling chapter of the team's journey. Step into the mesmerizing world of NFTs, where you relive MIBR's epic victories, tears, and unparalleled contribution to the world of competitive e-gaming. 

Twelve (12) limited edition NFTs will be released through six (6) separate drops on the Bybit NFT Marketplace over the course of six (6) weeks. Each week, one (1) free and one (1) paid MIBR NFTs will be made available to mint and purchase on a first-come, first-served basis. 

🗓️ Mark Your Calendars







Collect different designs to redeem amazing rewards. 

Rewards are classified into three tiers according to the number of NFTs collected.

Level 1 — All 12 NFTs:  An autographed 20th Anniversary MIBR Jersey.
Level 2 — 11 NFTs:  Personalized message from an MIBR ambassador or player.
Level 3 — 7 to 10 NFTs:  100 BRZ bonus on Bybit + 15% MIBR Store coupon (valid for all MIBR products, except collaborations with other brands such as New Era, Champion, and more).  








About MIBR
Made in Brazil, commonly known by its acronym MIBR (stylized as MiBR or mibr), is a professional e-sports organization with players competing in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Siege, and VALORANT. It was a member of the G7 Teams. MIBR was founded on March 1, 2003, in the city of Rio de Janeiro, where the Brazilian businessman Paulo Velloso decided to invest in his son's dream.

body:
Attention all blockchain enthusiasts! We are thrilled to announce our groundbreaking collaboration with Decentra to bring you an immersive and intensive Blockchain Engineering Bootcamp, taking place from Oct 2023 to Dec 2023.This marks our first groundbreaking educational sponsorship in the CIS region, providing aspiring individuals with an unmatched opportunity to delve into blockchain and develop essential career skills.


The bootcamp is exclusively for Bybit users! Not yet a Bybit user?







 
📚 The Ultimate Learning Experience 

This 8-week program is thoughtfully designed to equip developers with crucial web3 and blockchain expertise. Each week, participants will engage in an intense 4-day bootcamp, with each online course spanning 90 minutes. Throughout this transformative journey, participants will gain invaluable knowledge in the creation of smart contracts, dApps, DeFi protocols, and various other blockchain-related products.


🌟 Unparalleled Expertise 

Bybit's renowned experience in blockchain and cryptocurrency markets ensures that you will receive real-world insights and trading expertise. As a participant, you'll have exclusive access to connect with industry experts, mentors, and like-minded enthusiasts. This invaluable networking opportunity will pave the way for future career prospects and collaborations in the blockchain realm.


 🔮 Empowering the Future

This partnership fosters innovation and drives adoption in the industry, offering specialized education for aspiring engineers. Following the 8-week bootcamp, you can put your skills to the test in the upcoming Decentrathon hackathon scheduled for Mar, 2024.

name: Introducing Chase Limit Order: A New Derivatives Trading Tool
body:
We are excited to announce the addition of a new trading feature on Bybit: Chase Limit Order.

What is a Chase Limit Order? 

Chase Limit Order is a limit order placed at the best bid or ask that dynamically adjusts its entry price to match changing market conditions until the order is filled, canceled, or reaches a maximum chase distance. 

For more information on Chase limit Order, please refer to our   .

Key Benefits of Using Chase Limit Order

Swift Execution: Chase Limit Order allows traders to swiftly enter the market in maker order, minimizing the time spent waiting for favorable price levels. 
Reduced Slippage: Chase Limit Order helps mitigate the risk of slippage and approaches desired entry price as much as possible by dynamically tracking the best ask/bid. 
Arbitrage Opportunities: Chase Limit Orders create potential arbitrage chances by closely tracking market movements, enabling traders to profit from price disparities between markets or trading pairs. 

Currently, Chase Limit Order is available for Inverse Contracts, USDT Perpetuals, USDC Perpetuals, and USDC Futures on Bybit. 



Note:  To ensure an optimal user experience on the Bybit App, please upgrade to app v4.27.0 as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please reach out to our Customer Support team by submitting a case via   .

name: Introducing Double-Win: Surf Volatility to Score
body:
What's the key to riding out periods of massive market fluctuations or sudden spikes in volatility? The three S'es: Stoicism, Swift response, and creative hedging Strategies. We're thrilled to introduce a Bybit Earn product that offers them all. 


 Unveiling Double-Win  

Double-Win is an advanced short-term structured product that helps users preempt strong market movements in  both directions. 

 Learn more about Double-Win   

How does it work? 

 Double-Win is based on the concept of binary options. At expiration, users either receive a payoff if the settlement price sits outside the preset range, or nothing at all if the price falls within the range. 

 To subscribe to a Double-Win plan, start by setting a Double-Win range based on your prediction of the price of the underlying asset. 

 Here are the payoff scenarios of a Double-Win plan: 





 When to use Double-Win?   


Below are some examples of when a Double-Win plan might be suitable: 


Stay Ahead of the Curve:  Subscribe to Double-Win before the release of major indices such as CPI or LPR that may impact the market.
Finger on the Market Pulse:  Capitalize on headline events such as Ethereum upgrades or legal decisions.
Speculate on Swings:  Leverage strong market volatility within your Double-Win subscription period.
Hedge Against Volatility:  Help to manage market volatility risks with preset price ranges. 



 Key Advantages  

 -  Quick Settlement:  Provide a quick turnaround for your investment as Double-Win plans settle in as short as eight (8) hours.

 -  Diverse Preset Range:  Choose from a variety of preset ranges that give you the flexibility to tailor your strategies to market conditions. 

-  Unlimited Potential Returns:  Potential returns increase as the settlement price moves further away from the Double-Win range. 



 Availability 

 Double-Win is available on the Bybit website and app. 


 Catch the wave of market volatility. Discover Double-Win on Bybit.

name: Spot Trading Now Supports One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) Orders
body:
Spot Trading Now Supports One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) Orders 

We've added One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) order functionality to Bybit's Spot Trading on both our website and app. 

What Is an OCO Order? 
OCO orders allow you to set up two conditional triggers—one for an upper limit and one for a lower limit. When one is activated, the other is automatically canceled, executing a market or limit order. 

Why Use OCO Orders? 
1. Capital Efficiency: Allocate the cost of a one-sided order to establish conditional orders in both directions. 
2. Market Navigation: Utilize dual-directional triggers to manage exposure, enabling Take Profit and Stop Loss settings for your Spot assets. 
For more information, please check our  .

name: Trading Bot Update: Real-time Withdrawal Now Supported for Spot and Futures Grid Bots
body:
Dear Trader, 

To enhance your trading experience, we're thrilled to announce that real-time withdrawal is now supported for both Spot Grid Bot and Futures Grid Bot. With this update, you'll experience more control, flexibility, and efficiency over your trading assets. 

1. Spot Grid Bot:  Withdraw grid profits directly to the Funding Account without any disruption to the bot's operations. 

2. Futures Grid Bot:  Withdraw both profits generated and margin added while the bot is running. Funds will be automatically credited to the Funding Account. Please note, while bot operations remain unaffected, the margin will correspondingly reduce, and the estimated Liquidation Price may change. 

All return history can be seen on the History page under your Funding Account, giving you complete visibility over your transactions. 

Happy trading!

name: Velocity Series: Embark on Snowfro's Artistic Odyssey
body:
The moment we've all been waiting for is here! We're thrilled to unveil the  NFT  drop by  Erick   Calderon , also known as  Snowfro , a Houston-based artist whose boundary-pushing artistic experimentation leaves his mark on the world of generative art.

This is the third installment in the Velocity Series, an unprecedented collaboration spearheaded by Oracle Red Bull Racing and Bybit. We invite you to embark on a captivating artistic odyssey where velocity intersects with technology and creativity in an unparalleled way.


About the NFTs

///:  Snowfro's algorithmic, embroider-able collection of 2000 NFTs embodies the essence of speed through simple formal elements. He explores the delightful interplay of color and variability while working within the constraints of a physical 15-thread embroidery machine. Part of the limited collection will be available in a public rebate Dutch auction, with a special twist.


This limited collection will be available for minting in two phases: 




Velocity Pass holders are entitled to a one-hour free-mint phase for the /// NFT collection at 2PM UTC, on Oct 25, 2023. During this period, up to 1,000 NFTs will be available for free minting. A snapshot will be taken before the start of Phase 1 to determine participants' eligibility.


Following Phase 1, a one-hour public Dutch auction with rebates will commence at 3PM UTC, on Oct 25, 2023. This auction will include 700 + any remaining NFTs from the free-mint phase. The rebate Dutch auction is open to the public.

name: Updates to Auto-Repayment Threshold of Unified Trading Accounts
body:
Bybit will be making an important change to Unified Trading Accounts (UTA) on 9th Oct, 2023.

Starting from the mentioned date, the Auto-Repayment threshold for UTA will be increased from a Maintenance Margin Rate (MMR) of 80% to a MMR of 85%. Post this adjustment, Auto-Repayment will only be triggered when the UTA's MMR reaches 85% to repay outstanding liabilities.

Note: This adjustment will not require any action on your part, as it will reduce the risk of liquidation without affecting existing orders or positions.

If you have any questions or concerns about this adjustment, please don't hesitate to reach out to our Customer Support team through   .

name: Introducing Double-Win: Surf Volatility to Score
body:
What's the key to riding out periods of massive market fluctuations or sudden spikes in volatility? The three S'es: Stoicism, Swift response, and creative hedging Strategies. We're thrilled to introduce a Bybit Earn product that offers them all. 


 Unveiling Double-Win  

Double-Win is an advanced short-term structured product that helps users preempt strong market movements in  both directions. 

 Learn more about Double-Win   

How does it work? 

 Double-Win is based on the concept of binary options. At expiration, users either receive a payoff if the settlement price sits outside the preset range, or nothing at all if the price falls within the range. 

 To subscribe to a Double-Win plan, start by setting a Double-Win range based on your prediction of the price of the underlying asset. 

 Here are the payoff scenarios of a Double-Win plan: 





 When to use Double-Win?   


Below are some examples of when a Double-Win plan might be suitable: 


Stay Ahead of the Curve:  Subscribe to Double-Win before the release of major indices such as CPI or LPR that may impact the market.
Finger on the Market Pulse:  Capitalize on headline events such as Ethereum upgrades or legal decisions.
Speculate on Swings:  Leverage strong market volatility within your Double-Win subscription period.
Hedge Against Volatility:  Help to manage market volatility risks with preset price ranges. 



 Key Advantages  

 -  Quick Settlement:  Provide a quick turnaround for your investment as Double-Win plans settle in as short as eight (8) hours.

 -  Diverse Preset Range:  Choose from a variety of preset ranges that give you the flexibility to tailor your strategies to market conditions. 

-  Unlimited Potential Returns:  Potential returns increase as the settlement price moves further away from the Double-Win range. 



 Availability 

 Double-Win is available on the Bybit website and app. 


 Catch the wave of market volatility. Discover Double-Win on Bybit.

name: Congratulations to Bybit Web3 IDO Cyber Arena (CAT) Winners!
Introducing Chase Limit Order: A New Derivatives Trading Tool
body:
We are excited to announce the addition of a new trading feature on Bybit: Chase Limit Order.

What is a Chase Limit Order? 

Chase Limit Order is a limit order placed at the best bid or ask that dynamically adjusts its entry price to match changing market conditions until the order is filled, canceled, or reaches a maximum chase distance. 

For more information on Chase limit Order, please refer to our   .

Key Benefits of Using Chase Limit Order

Swift Execution: Chase Limit Order allows traders to swiftly enter the market in maker order, minimizing the time spent waiting for favorable price levels. 
Reduced Slippage: Chase Limit Order helps mitigate the risk of slippage and approaches desired entry price as much as possible by dynamically tracking the best ask/bid. 
Arbitrage Opportunities: Chase Limit Orders create potential arbitrage chances by closely tracking market movements, enabling traders to profit from price disparities between markets or trading pairs. 

Currently, Chase Limit Order is available for Inverse Contracts, USDT Perpetuals, USDC Perpetuals, and USDC Futures on Bybit. 



Note:  To ensure an optimal user experience on the Bybit App, please upgrade to app v4.27.0 as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please reach out to our Customer Support team by submitting a case via   .

name: MIBR NFT Collection Drop — Grab a Piece of E-sports History
body:
Made   in   Brazil  ( MIBR ), an e-sports OG and a true legend, is commemorating its twenty years of history with the release of a series of limited edition NFTs with Bybit. The first series comprises 12 different jersey designs — each embodying a compelling chapter of the team's journey. Step into the mesmerizing world of NFTs, where you relive MIBR's epic victories, tears, and unparalleled contribution to the world of competitive e-gaming. 

Twelve (12) limited edition NFTs will be released through six (6) separate drops on the Bybit NFT Marketplace over the course of six (6) weeks. Each week, one (1) free and one (1) paid MIBR NFTs will be made available to mint and purchase on a first-come, first-served basis. 

🗓️ Mark Your Calendars







Collect different designs to redeem amazing rewards. 

Rewards are classified into three tiers according to the number of NFTs collected.

Level 1 — All 12 NFTs:  An autographed 20th Anniversary MIBR Jersey.
Level 2 — 11 NFTs:  Personalized message from an MIBR ambassador or player.
Level 3 — 7 to 10 NFTs:  100 BRZ bonus on Bybit + 15% MIBR Store coupon (valid for all MIBR products, except collaborations with other brands such as New Era, Champion, and more).  








About MIBR
Made in Brazil, commonly known by its acronym MIBR (stylized as MiBR or mibr), is a professional e-sports organization with players competing in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Siege, and VALORANT. It was a member of the G7 Teams. MIBR was founded on March 1, 2003, in the city of Rio de Janeiro, where the Brazilian businessman Paulo Velloso decided to invest in his son's dream.

name: Spot Trading Now Supports One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) Orders
body:
Spot Trading Now Supports One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) Orders 

We've added One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) order functionality to Bybit's Spot Trading on both our website and app. 

What Is an OCO Order? 
OCO orders allow you to set up two conditional triggers—one for an upper limit and one for a lower limit. When one is activated, the other is automatically canceled, executing a market or limit order. 

Why Use OCO Orders? 
1. Capital Efficiency: Allocate the cost of a one-sided order to establish conditional orders in both directions. 
2. Market Navigation: Utilize dual-directional triggers to manage exposure, enabling Take Profit and Stop Loss settings for your Spot assets. 
For more information, please check our  .

name: Spot Trading Now Supports One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) Orders
body:
Spot Trading Now Supports One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) Orders 

We've added One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) order functionality to Bybit's Spot Trading on both our website and app. 

What Is an OCO Order? 
OCO orders allow you to set up two conditional triggers—one for an upper limit and one for a lower limit. When one is activated, the other is automatically canceled, executing a market or limit order. 

Why Use OCO Orders? 
1. Capital Efficiency: Allocate the cost of a one-sided order to establish conditional orders in both directions. 
2. Market Navigation: Utilize dual-directional triggers to manage exposure, enabling Take Profit and Stop Loss settings for your Spot assets. 
For more information, please check our  .

name: MIBR NFT Collection Drop — Grab a Piece of E-sports History
body:
Made   in   Brazil  ( MIBR ), an e-sports OG and a true legend, is commemorating its twenty years of history with the release of a series of limited edition NFTs with Bybit. The first series comprises 12 different jersey designs — each embodying a compelling chapter of the team's journey. Step into the mesmerizing world of NFTs, where you relive MIBR's epic victories, tears, and unparalleled contribution to the world of competitive e-gaming. 

Twelve (12) limited edition NFTs will be released through six (6) separate drops on the Bybit NFT Marketplace over the course of six (6) weeks. Each week, one (1) free and one (1) paid MIBR NFTs will be made available to mint and purchase on a first-come, first-served basis. 

🗓️ Mark Your Calendars







Collect different designs to redeem amazing rewards. 

Rewards are classified into three tiers according to the number of NFTs collected.

Level 1 — All 12 NFTs:  An autographed 20th Anniversary MIBR Jersey.
Level 2 — 11 NFTs:  Personalized message from an MIBR ambassador or player.
Level 3 — 7 to 10 NFTs:  100 BRZ bonus on Bybit + 15% MIBR Store coupon (valid for all MIBR products, except collaborations with other brands such as New Era, Champion, and more).  








About MIBR
Made in Brazil, commonly known by its acronym MIBR (stylized as MiBR or mibr), is a professional e-sports organization with players competing in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Siege, and VALORANT. It was a member of the G7 Teams. MIBR was founded on March 1, 2003, in the city of Rio de Janeiro, where the Brazilian businessman Paulo Velloso decided to invest in his son's dream.

We are excited to announce the addition of a new trading feature on Bybit: Chase Limit Order.

What is a Chase Limit Order? 

Chase Limit Order is a limit order placed at the best bid or ask that dynamically adjusts its entry price to match changing market conditions until the order is filled, canceled, or reaches a maximum chase distance. 

For more information on Chase limit Order, please refer to our   .

Key Benefits of Using Chase Limit Order

Swift Execution: Chase Limit Order allows traders to swiftly enter the market in maker order, minimizing the time spent waiting for favorable price levels. 
Reduced Slippage: Chase Limit Order helps mitigate the risk of slippage and approaches desired entry price as much as possible by dynamically tracking the best ask/bid. 
Arbitrage Opportunities: Chase Limit Orders create potential arbitrage chances by closely tracking market movements, enabling traders to profit from price disparities between markets or trading pairs. 

Currently, Chase Limit Order is available for Inverse Contracts, USDT Perpetuals, USDC Perpetuals, and USDC Futures on Bybit. 



Note:  To ensure an optimal user experience on the Bybit App, please upgrade to app v4.27.0 as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please reach out to our Customer Support team by submitting a case via   .

name: Introducing Double-Win: Surf Volatility to Score
body:
What's the key to riding out periods of massive market fluctuations or sudden spikes in volatility? The three S'es: Stoicism, Swift response, and creative hedging Strategies. We're thrilled to introduce a Bybit Earn product that offers them all. 


 Unveiling Double-Win  

Double-Win is an advanced short-term structured product that helps users preempt strong market movements in  both directions. 

 Learn more about Double-Win   

How does it work? 

 Double-Win is based on the concept of binary options. At expiration, users either receive a payoff if the settlement price sits outside the preset range, or nothing at all if the price falls within the range. 

 To subscribe to a Double-Win plan, start by setting a Double-Win range based on your prediction of the price of the underlying asset. 

 Here are the payoff scenarios of a Double-Win plan: 





 When to use Double-Win?   


Below are some examples of when a Double-Win plan might be suitable: 


Stay Ahead of the Curve:  Subscribe to Double-Win before the release of major indices such as CPI or LPR that may impact the market.
Finger on the Market Pulse:  Capitalize on headline events such as Ethereum upgrades or legal decisions.
Speculate on Swings:  Leverage strong market volatility within your Double-Win subscription period.
Hedge Against Volatility:  Help to manage market volatility risks with preset price ranges. 



 Key Advantages  

 -  Quick Settlement:  Provide a quick turnaround for your investment as Double-Win plans settle in as short as eight (8) hours.

 -  Diverse Preset Range:  Choose from a variety of preset ranges that give you the flexibility to tailor your strategies to market conditions. 

-  Unlimited Potential Returns:  Potential returns increase as the settlement price moves further away from the Double-Win range. 



 Availability 

 Double-Win is available on the Bybit website and app. 


 Catch the wave of market volatility. Discover Double-Win on Bybit.

name: Spot Trading Now Supports One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) Orders
body:
Spot Trading Now Supports One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) Orders 

We've added One-Cancels-the-Other (OCO) order functionality to Bybit's Spot Trading on both our website and app. 

What Is an OCO Order? 
OCO orders allow you to set up two conditional triggers—one for an upper limit and one for a lower limit. When one is activated, the other is automatically canceled, executing a market or limit order. 

Why Use OCO Orders? 
1. Capital Efficiency: Allocate the cost of a one-sided order to establish conditional orders in both directions. 
2. Market Navigation: Utilize dual-directional triggers to manage exposure, enabling Take Profit and Stop Loss settings for your Spot assets. 
For more information, please check our  .

body:

name: Introducing Double-Win: Surf Volatility to Score
body:
What's the key to riding out periods of massive market fluctuations or sudden spikes in volatility? The three S'es: Stoicism, Swift response, and creative hedging Strategies. We're thrilled to introduce a Bybit Earn product that offers them all. 


 Unveiling Double-Win  

Double-Win is an advanced short-term structured product that helps users preempt strong market movements in  both directions. 

 Learn more about Double-Win   

How does it work? 

 Double-Win is based on the concept of binary options. At expiration, users either receive a payoff if the settlement price sits outside the preset range, or nothing at all if the price falls within the range. 

 To subscribe to a Double-Win plan, start by setting a Double-Win range based on your prediction of the price of the underlying asset. 

 Here are the payoff scenarios of a Double-Win plan: 





 When to use Double-Win?   


Below are some examples of when a Double-Win plan might be suitable: 


Stay Ahead of the Curve:  Subscribe to Double-Win before the release of major indices such as CPI or LPR that may impact the market.
Finger on the Market Pulse:  Capitalize on headline events such as Ethereum upgrades or legal decisions.
Speculate on Swings:  Leverage strong market volatility within your Double-Win subscription period.
Hedge Against Volatility:  Help to manage market volatility risks with preset price ranges. 



 Key Advantages  

 -  Quick Settlement:  Provide a quick turnaround for your investment as Double-Win plans settle in as short as eight (8) hours.

 -  Diverse Preset Range:  Choose from a variety of preset ranges that give you the flexibility to tailor your strategies to market conditions. 

-  Unlimited Potential Returns:  Potential returns increase as the settlement price moves further away from the Double-Win range. 



 Availability 

 Double-Win is available on the Bybit website and app. 


 Catch the wave of market volatility. Discover Double-Win on Bybit.

name: Introducing Chase Limit Order: A New Derivatives Trading Tool
body:
We are excited to announce the addition of a new trading feature on Bybit: Chase Limit Order.

What is a Chase Limit Order? 

Chase Limit Order is a limit order placed at the best bid or ask that dynamically adjusts its entry price to match changing market conditions until the order is filled, canceled, or reaches a maximum chase distance. 

For more information on Chase limit Order, please refer to our   .

Key Benefits of Using Chase Limit Order

Swift Execution: Chase Limit Order allows traders to swiftly enter the market in maker order, minimizing the time spent waiting for favorable price levels. 
Reduced Slippage: Chase Limit Order helps mitigate the risk of slippage and approaches desired entry price as much as possible by dynamically tracking the best ask/bid. 
Arbitrage Opportunities: Chase Limit Orders create potential arbitrage chances by closely tracking market movements, enabling traders to profit from price disparities between markets or trading pairs. 

Currently, Chase Limit Order is available for Inverse Contracts, USDT Perpetuals, USDC Perpetuals, and USDC Futures on Bybit.

name: Velocity Series: Embark on Snowfro's Artistic Odyssey
body:
The moment we've all been waiting for is here! We're thrilled to unveil the  NFT  drop by  Erick   Calderon , also known as  Snowfro , a Houston-based artist whose boundary-pushing artistic experimentation leaves his mark on the world of generative art.

This is the third installment in the Velocity Series, an unprecedented collaboration spearheaded by Oracle Red Bull Racing and Bybit. We invite you to embark on a captivating artistic odyssey where velocity intersects with technology and creativity in an unparalleled way.


About the NFTs

///:  Snowfro's algorithmic, embroider-able collection of 2000 NFTs embodies the essence of speed through simple formal elements. He explores the delightful interplay of color and variability while working within the constraints of a physical 15-thread embroidery machine. Part of the limited collection will be available in a public rebate Dutch auction, with a special twist.


This limited collection will be available for minting in two phases: 




Velocity Pass holders are entitled to a one-hour free-mint phase for the /// NFT collection at 2PM UTC, on Oct 25, 2023. During this period, up to 1,000 NFTs will be available for free minting. A snapshot will be taken before the start of Phase 1 to determine participants' eligibility.


Following Phase 1, a one-hour public Dutch auction with rebates will commence at 3PM UTC, on Oct 25, 2023. This auction will include 700 + any remaining NFTs from the free-mint phase. The rebate Dutch auction is open to the public.

name: Introducing the Bybit x Decentra Bootcamp: Embrace a New Era in Blockchain Education
body:
Attention all blockchain enthusiasts! We are thrilled to announce our groundbreaking collaboration with Decentra to bring you an immersive and intensive Blockchain Engineering Bootcamp, taking place from Oct 2023 to Dec 2023.This marks our first groundbreaking educational sponsorship in the CIS region, providing aspiring individuals with an unmatched opportunity to delve into blockchain and develop essential career skills.


The bootcamp is exclusively for Bybit users! Not yet a Bybit user?







 
📚 The Ultimate Learning Experience 

This 8-week program is thoughtfully designed to equip developers with crucial web3 and blockchain expertise. Each week, participants will engage in an intense 4-day bootcamp, with each online course spanning 90 minutes. Throughout this transformative journey, participants will gain invaluable knowledge in the creation of smart contracts, dApps, DeFi protocols, and various other blockchain-related products.


🌟 Unparalleled Expertise 

Bybit's renowned experience in blockchain and cryptocurrency markets ensures that you will receive real-world insights and trading expertise. As a participant, you'll have exclusive access to connect with industry experts, mentors, and like-minded enthusiasts. This invaluable networking opportunity will pave the way for future career prospects and collaborations in the blockchain realm.


 🔮 Empowering the Future

This partnership fosters innovation and drives adoption in the industry, offering specialized education for aspiring engineers. Following the 8-week bootcamp, you can put your skills to the test in the upcoming Decentrathon hackathon scheduled for Mar, 2024.


🤝 Continued Support for Education

We remain dedicated to offering accessible, high-quality content for cryptocurrency enthusiasts, traders, and blockchain aficionados. For more free crypto resources, visit   


Join us on this incredible educational journey from Oct 2023 to Dec 2023. Secure your spot today!


🌐 Learn More and Register 👇

name: Bybit x Mantle AMA
body:
Are you ready to dive into the world of Mantle? Join our Discord AMA with Edmund from Mantle  at 2PM UTC on Oct 13, 2023. 


 Here's how you can participate: 


Step 1: Tune in to our Voice Channel for the AMA and get to know more about Mantle and their latest project, Mantle Journey! 


Step 2: Submit a relevant and insight question about Mantle    Each person can only submit one question. Multiple submissions will lead to disqualification from the current and future AMAs. 


 Five (5) questions will be selected and answered by Edmund from Mantle! Participants whose questions are selected will each receive a 30 USDT bonus.


 That's not all! In the second half of the AMA, we will have a Kahoot quiz to test your knowledge on Mantle. The top 5 scorers will each take home a 20 USDT bonus. 


 May the fortune be with you! Make sure you already have a Bybit account before joining our AMA, or sign up for one by clicking the button below. 




 
 Terms and Conditions

 - Users must complete Identity Verification Lv. 1 to be eligible for rewards. 

- Winners will be determined based on the scores they obtained in the quiz. 

- Bybit bonuses can be used as margin for Derivatives trading. They can also be used to cover trading losses and offset trading fees prior to the user's own capital. Bonuses cannot be withdrawn, while profits from trading with bonuses can be withdrawn. Please note that bonuses are forfeited upon any asset withdrawal. 

- All bonuses will be deposited in the winners' Rewards Hub within 21 working days after the end of the event. 

-An email notification will be sent to notify that the rewards have been issued. Users will have to manually claim their rewards from the Rewards Hub within 30 days of receiving the email notification. 

-All participating users must strictly abide by the Bybit Terms of Service. Bybit reserves the right to disqualify any participants who engage in dishonest or abusive activities during the event, including bulk-account registrations to farm additional bonuses and any other activities in connection with unlawful, fraudulent, or harmful purposes 

-Bybit reserves the right of final interpretation of the Terms and Conditions. If you have any questions, please contact our Customer Support.
